title: Hairy type fonts! by cpd-work! Must see illustrative type
content:
Hair Peace Download this code to create colourful hairy creations from .svg files. You’ll need to download Nodebox to open the file. I’ve included a few sliders to alter a couple of variables but feel free to play with them all. You can change the .svg image as well, so get growing. Who did this? CPD-WORK did and is the work of Designer Chris Davenport.

Go Mr. Davenport! His Portfolio here\> [http://cpd-work.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20111210174546/http:/cpd-work.com/ "http://cpd-work.com/")  
You will also need NodeBox For this!get that here\> [http://nodebox.net/code/index.php/Home](http://web.archive.org/web/20111210174546/http:/nodebox.net/code/index.php/Home "http://nodebox.net/code/index.php/Home")

Click here 2 download project file! [http://beingmadeby.cpd-work.com/Misc/hairy.zip](http://web.archive.org/web/20111210174546/http:/beingmadeby.cpd-work.com/Misc/hairy.zip "http://beingmadeby.cpd-work.com/Misc/hairy.zip")
